title: Computes hypothesis tests within the NIST Decision Tree.

standard_uncertainties.description: Standard uncertainties for each measurement result, for each laboratory.

homogeneity_alpha.description: Type 1 error rate (alpha) for the test of homogeneity. Default is 0.10.

normality_alpha.description: Type 1 error rate (alpha) for the test of normality. Default is 0.05.

symmetry_alpha.description: Type 1 error rate (alpha) for the test of symmetry. Default is 0.05.
